name: Robot and Drone
description:
A short game about a robot and drone that need to work together to complete the task.

This game contains 3 short level.

Robot Movement  :

A, D to move

Space to jump

Drone Movement :

W, A, S, D to move

LMB or Enter to shoot

This Game is Uploaded to be a submission to the NEWBIES GAME JAM (2022 - 2)

P.S : This game doesn't have any audio
